synopsis.text: One day, Ash finds himself inexplicably tethered to the mythical Pokémon, Volcanion, following its descent from the sky. Volcanion, harboring a deep disdain for humans, is unable to escape and reluctantly drags Ash along on its quest. Their journey leads them to a city brimming with cogs and gears, where a dishonest minister has seized the ultimate creation: the artificial Pokémon, Magearna, crafted half a millennium ago. The minister's nefarious plan involves harnessing Magearna's enigmatic power to seize control of the mechanical realm. Will Ash and Volcanion join forces to save Magearna and thwart the minister's scheme? Brace yourself for one of the most epic battles in Pokémon history!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
